CustomField.formula: CASE(MOD( DATEVALUE( Created_date__c ) - DATE(0001,1,1) , 7) , 0 , 'Saturday' , 1 , 'Sunday' , 2 , 'Monday' , 3 , 'Tuesday' , 4 , 'Wednesday' , 5 , 'Thursday' , 6 , 'Friday' , 'No Day Found')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Display the Created Day of the week as example (Monday)
CustomField.label: Created Day of Week
